review: Chromecast is an amazing little device with tons of potential. Mine stays plugged in and on most of the time and is very stable.
author: Brad M.

review: I have another media streaming device on one of my TV's but the Chromecast is by far superior. Turns my TV into a Smart TV and it is easy to set up and easy to use. Delivery time was very very short. I would recommend this Streaming Media Player to anyone that wants to turn their TV into a Smart TV.
author: Jacqui

review: Hard to transmit to TV and has a very bad lag when you broadcast to the TV. Must be in Crome to use the device. Cant talk directly from PC to Chromecast.
author: bob

review: Can't beat the price.  Runs netflix and Pandora without killing your battery.  Great picture quality.  Streams videos from chrome (used it to watch the superbowl!) wish it worked with Amazon prime. So easy to use and portable so I can bring it with me as I travel.
author: Mario Cruz

review: Love this. I use it with Plex, Showbox, Pandora... It's an amazing invention. Love my Chromecast!! Only thing that doesn't work too well is when you are on a public network internet, like at a hotel or hospital. For some reason, even if they do not require a sign in page, it won't work.
author: Alicia816

review: I enjoy using this with my Galaxy Note 10.1. I used to try connect my tablet with some cable but have found it cumbersome. Now with this Chromecast I can watch my favorite videos wirelessly. I don't experience any drop in the streaming.
author: Amran Bin Noordin

review: Glad I got this at a fair price! It's fun to use, especially with a quality TV. Good luck finding it if you're looking for it.
author: Michael Mendoza

review: Don't pay for cable TV . Buy chromecast and get an internet connection. Stream from a lot of apps. Enjoy
author: Rameshkumar T

review: Does exactly what it said it would. Minimal startup time. Excellent picture quality. Not bad at all for the price.
author: Michael P

review: While this product is as advertised, it comes up short in the serviceability department.  The device only works with PC oriented applications and will not work with an Apple product.UPDATE:More applications have been added.  Playing Netflix from iPad and then "throwing" the content to the TV is fun.  Each family member can browse on their individual iPads and play content at their discretion based on the feedback of everyone else.
author: Stone
